attributes.action: step in to prevent Kraft from closing the Sudbury Factory or ask the Royal Family to revoke the Royal Warrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kraft stated they would not close the Sudbury Factory before its takeover of Cadbury and have now announced its plan to close it putting 400 British workers out of work, presumably with the plan to move production overseas. This is surely incompatible with holding a Royal Warrant.
